elements.title: Yokcushlu (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Yokcushlu (pictured) was taken hostage on HMS Beagle and named after a basket?

elements.title: Delresto (Echoes) (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Travis Scott expressed interest in collaborating with Beyoncé eight years before creating "Delresto (Echoes)" with her?

elements.title: Mike Venaani (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Mike Venaani serves alongside his son in the Namibian National Assembly?

elements.title: Project Ketch (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Project Ketch proposed the detonation of a 24-kiloton nuclear device in Pennsylvania to create a natural-gas storage reservoir?

elements.title: misanthropes (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that some misanthropes reject humanity because of how humans treat other animals?

elements.title: Ann Corcoran (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Ann Corcoran has wrongly claimed that refugees are a Muslim plot to colonize the United States?

elements.title: kawal (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that fermented leaves are used to make a meat substitute in Sudan called kawal?

elements.title: Nancy Reagan was hexakosioihexekontahexaphobic (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Nancy Reagan was hexakosioihexekontahexaphobic?
